title: "Machine learning improves satellite imagery analysis of North Korean nuclear activity"
excerpt: "Much of the available data on nuclear activities in North Korea comes from earth observation satellites. But there's a drawback: with increased coverage and higher resolution, analysts face challenges in systematically analyzing image datasets on a large scale."
